product_name: Scott Road Team Boa Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The sleek, asymmetric men's Scott Road Team BOA Bike Shoes deliver serious response and long distance comfort for performance-driven athletes. Close-fitting, synthetic-leather uppers are supportive, comfortable and free of pressure points. BOA L5 reel at top and midfoot let you quickly dial in the cable lace for a perfect fit. Vent on bottom of sole draws air in and then out the mesh panels on top, enhancing foot comfort. Lower anatomic strap on the Scott Road Team Boa Bike Shoes fine-tunes the fit. Insole features an adjustable arch support and metatarsal button. Injection-molded nylon-and-fiberglass sole is plenty stiff and features a replaceable TPU heel tread.
short_description: The sleek, asymmetric men's Scott Road Team BOA Bike Shoes deliver serious response and long distance comfort for performance-driven athletes.
